Detailed Description

Custom definitions to support a particular OS/platform. Common data type definitions for usability on a particular platform. Customized per platform/project depending on the OS and system environment that the code will be built with and run on. If the platform/build environment doesn't support certain POSIX standard types, defines, etc. specify them here. This file is customized per build platform (ie. one version for building with Linux, another for VxWorks, etc.)
